Absolutely amazing.

Despite their age, Half-Life 2 and its episodes still hold up in terms of visual, sound, and combat design. The FPS gameplay is dated--there is no zoom on most guns!--but otherwise it feels about as solid and fresh as it did at release. (I would say that the vehicle handling is subpar, but let's be honest: very few FPS games have even adequate vehicle handling, so I can't expect too much.)

10/10

This game saved my life.

I am 41.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.
After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you
si

Half life'ı 8 yaşında CS 1.5 in dosyalarını incelerken keşfetmiştim. O zamanlar uzun bir tren yolculuğunun ardından test alanına gelip oyunu kapatmam bir olmuştu. Çok korkmuştum tabi çocuktuk o zamanlar. Geçen zamanın ardından ortaokula giderken Half Life'ı açıp baştan sona bitirmiştim. Bu sene ise Black Mesa ile baştan sona tekrardan başlayıp burada noktayı koydum. Sonu çok üzücü bitti aynı zamanda ise çok yarım kaldı. Umarım devam oyunu gelir ve bizim gibi oyuncuların kafasında soru işareti kalmaz.
Zamanının ötesinde bu yüzden hala keyif veriyor!

Half-Life 2: Episode Two

Positives:
+ the story telling
+ alyx is by your side almost the entire game
+ the gravity gun
+ great physics
+ great sound
+ funny puzzles
+ good animations
+ the driving part is back
+ much more "fresh air" in this game vs episode one
+ more variation vs episode one
+ some improvement in graphics

Negatives:
- more improvement in graphics would have made it better
- some repeating stuff here and there
- episode three does not exist for now

The original Half Life 2 is a really great game period.
Episode One made me a bit disappointed to be honest.
Dont get me wrong, it was still good, but not great.
Episode Two is better and more true to the original, and more varied.
Its still not as great as the original half-life 2, but not far from.
Too bad valve didnt finish the job with Episode 3.
Lets hope it will be done sometime in the future.

Total Score: 8/10

Almost completely flawless. The definition of half-life. Everything is well though out and refined and is 100% the entire way though. Of course I'd prefer more great and a few bad than a straight line of pretty good. Which is comparing half-life 2 to this. The combat is really good and some of the best encounters in the series, peak of the half-life story, puzzles are well designed and though out and the environment is really nice. Doesn't really keep up with the tradition of completely changing over every chapter but is still nice. Introduces some new characters to the games and some new gameplay mechanics. Very good.

🔲 História? que história?

🔲 Aceitável (4 dedos pra ser específico)

🔲 Jogo da velha é mais complexo
🔲 Fácil de entender

- DIFICULDADE
🔲 Você escolhe a dificuldade
🔲 Seu cachorro consegue
🔲 Da pra zerar com uma batata de controle
🔲 Fácil
✅ Normal
🔲 Quase Dark Souls, ativando ou não o MODO DEUS
🔲 Dark Souls
🔲 Você precisa de reflexos instantâneos e 4 mãos

- TEMPO DE JOGO

🔲 6h
✅ 12h
🔲 24h
🔲 48h
🔲 100h+
🔲 Você começa, seu neto termina

- TRILHA SONORA/ÁUDIO

🔲 É melhor jogar no mudo
🔲 Aceitável
🔲 Muito bom
✅ Perfeita

- BUGS
🔲 Não Existe
✅ Pequenos bugs
🔲 Pode ficar irritante
🔲 Pode estragar a gameplay
🔲 Parece até uma lâmpada acesa cheia de inseto

- PÚBLICO
✅ Fetos
✅ Crianças

Absolute masterpiece, one of the best game of the last decade. When I first time played this in 2010 I had cracked version of this and after I finished it I was overwhelmed, because at that time the graphic was amazing, about the story, it was 10x better than Episode One. Thumbs up for Valve (Even though we are still waiting for HL3 or Episode 3). And now when I'm playing it after 11 years, it's still great game, I feel little nostalgia and still feel sad at the end of the game. Not just because Eli died (spoiler), but I have worries that we will never get Episode 3 or HL3, It's 13 years from release after all and I'm losing hope. Despite that it's amazing game and I'm proud of it. :-)

Now, this episode is amazing. Episode 1 was pretty cool, but this one is just better in every way. New mechanics, new environments, new enemies, epic moments with amazing soundtrack and wonderful character development. Knocked out of the park again.

I sure can't wait to see what happens next.
